headline: Builders FirstSource Announces $500 Million Share Repurchase Authorization
summary: IRVING, Texas, May 01, 2025--Builders FirstSource, Inc. (NYSE: BLDR) announced its Board of Directors authorized the repurchase of up to $500 million of the Company’s outstanding shares of common stock, which includes the approximately $100 million remaining under its prior August 2024 authorization.
